Text:
if you are a fan of mastodon, check out this awesome prog/rock/metal album on the pirate bay at the below link. it's my album of the year.

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6537696/SUBVERSION__Lest_We_Forget_2011_320kbps_mp3
Thanks for the link, I'm downloading it now.  I'll seed for you, of course.
